name: Blue Torso: Tiger's Roar
description: A woodcarving torso with hands modeled after the claws of the Rishboland Tiger. It can be used to assemble an "Aranara Carving." It is painted blue and reminds people of a forest stream.\nRishboland Tigers often appear in the wilds of Sumeru. Their witty, brave, and curious behaviors are often portrayed in fairy tales. The woodcarving torso reminds people of Aranara who are as lively and energetic as Rishboland Tigers.
